ygData.subject: Re: Still in Space (but not for long)
ygData.msgSnippet: Rogue Star stumbles to its appointed landing site with none of its usual grace.  It sets down rather heavily, jarring the crew. Call that a landing? Jayde

Rogue Star stumbles to its appointed landing site with none of its 
usual grace.  It sets down rather heavily, jarring the crew.

"Call that a landing?" Jayde gripes.

"Quiet," Gatara orders.  "Jayde, you and Riekan will scout out the 
surrounding area.  Stay cloaked, keep together, and don't engage if 
you don't have to.  Torin, you and I are going to start repairs."

---

Phoenix starts as the locking mechanism on her door snaps into 
place.  If the Rogues locked her in, then they must be in greater 
trouble than she'd originally thought.

---

Riekan and Jayde pause outside the ship.  Riekan transforms to his 
vehicle mode, a largish hover transport.  "Hop on," he instructs.

"I can get around on my own," Jayde retorts, "and faster."

"Gatara said stick together," the larger Rogue points out.  "And I 
outrank you.  Get on."

Jayde open her mouth to complain again, but thinks better of it.  
Sullenly, she clambers aboard, and the duo set off, shimmering and 
disappearing as their personal cloaking devices kick in.
